title: Boy, 16, shot in West Englewood
content:
A 16-year-old boy was shot Friday night in the West Englewood neighborhood on the South Side.
He was standing on the sidewalk about 9:50 p.m. in the 6900 block of South Hermitage when he heard gunfire and felt pain, according to Chicago Police.
A family member drove him to Holy Cross Hospital with a gunshot wound to his back, police said. He was later transferred to Mount Sinai Hospital, where his condition stabilized.
